explains: adj. 脊椎动物（有关）的；有脊椎的

sentences.en: The left side of most vertebrate brains, for example, seems to process and control feeding.
sentences.cn: 例如，大多数脊椎动物的左脑似乎负责的是处理和控制进食。

sentences.en: Thus the anaerobic energy reserves of a vertebrate are proportional to the size of the animal.
sentences.cn: 因此，脊椎动物的无氧能量储备与动物的大小成正比。

sentences.en: This is not surprising because the design of any flying vertebrate is subject to aerodynamic constraints.
sentences.cn: 这并不奇怪，因为任何会飞的脊椎动物的设计都受到空气动力学的限制。
